Text: EOL Hedge funds any issues Cc I hope you can help me Are there any issues with us trading with Hedge funds on EnronOnline Galtere have applied and seem to be one I look forward to hearing from you Regards Marie PCG London Forwarded by Marie WestinLONECT on Justin Boyd To Marie CT cc Subject Re Toyota Tsusho America Inc Galtere International Master Fund New Counterparties for EnronOnline Marie Subject to my comment below and to the Segregated Accounts notice for metals I approve for all products except for US power credit and weather However in the case of the Galtere please check with the US PCG whether trading with Hedge funds gives rise to any particular legal issues Justin Marie Westin To Justin CT cc Subject Toyota Tsusho America Inc Galtere International Master Fund New Counterparties for EnronOnline Hi there Could you please approve the above Galtere is a US company Hedging fund and Toyota is also a US company Both metals Thanks Marie Forwarded by Marie WestinLONECT on From Enron London EOL Product Control Group Sent by Marie Westin To Robert CT Paul CT ECT London Credit cc Hamish M nron Alan nron Diana CT Lindsay F nron Enron Europe Global CounterParty Enron Europe Global Contracts and Facilities Alex CT Britta CT Enron London EOL Product Control CT EOL Marketing CT Annette CT Subject Toyota Tsusho America Inc Galtere International Master Fund New Counterparties for EnronOnline Please can you review the above named counterparties in the S Drive Access Database Please inform me by return email when this has been done GCP Please note customer does not have EOL link in GCP GCP id Credit please note that Galtere International Master Fund is not set up in GCP Regards Marie PCG London Forwarded by Marie WestinLONECT on London Fax System To Enron London EOL Product Control CT cc Subject New fax received Likely sender You have received a new fax from The image contains pages
